detail_desc: Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Leggings in soft jersey with a motif and an elasticated waist.

Shirt dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and seam with a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with small, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped top in mesh with gathered elastication front and back for a draped effect. Square neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication around the shoulders and hems. Jersey lining.
Thick socks knitted in a soft wool blend with a ribbed shaft.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey. One with a sewn-on bow at the front and one with a decorative knot detail.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels, welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a frill-trimmed elasticated waist with a decorative bow at the front, and elasticated hems.
Narrow metal Alice band decorated with pearly plastic beads and glass rhinestones.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with flounces down the front that continue down the back. Small opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a hook and eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Wide shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back with a raw-edge lace trim .
Hat in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a faux fur pompom on the top.
Short wrap dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long trumpet sleeves. Lined.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
Pyjama jacket in soft, jacquard-weave viscose with decorative piping. Shawl collar, detachable tie belt at the waist, long, cuffed sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short, high-waisted twill shorts in a cotton blend with a concealed zip in one side and fake front pockets with decorative metal buttons.
Knee-length dress in slub cotton jersey with a V-neck, butterfly sleeves and a gathered, elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

prod_name: Make him pay for it PREMIUM
detail_desc: Long cardigan knitted in a soft wool and alpaca blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, collar in woven fabric, button placket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, a scalloped neckline and short puff sleeves with a scalloped edge.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with taped details, an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and narrow elastic strap at the sides.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button. Unlined.
Hair clips in metal decorated with both real and plastic shells. Length 6 cm.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.

Sleeveless dress in sequin-embroidered tulle with concealed press-studs at the back, a seam at the waist, a flared skirt in two layers of tulle and an underskirt with a tulle flounce at the hem. Lined.

Set with a plumeti blouse and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Blouse with an elasticated neckline, short cap sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems.

Shirt in premium cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit ‒ a fitted style with shaping seams at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.

Set in soft fabric. Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and braided belt. Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length kaftan in an airy jacquard weave made from recycled polyester. V-neck with billowing flounces at the front, low dropped shoulders and deep, flounce-trimmed armholes. Asymmetric hem. Longer at the back. V-neck underdress in airy jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The underdress is made from recycled polyester.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Stylish, fitted, calf-length coat in a herringbone weave made from a wool blend with oversized notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Wide, adjustable belt with tone-on-tone buttons worn above the waist. Adjustable tab with a button at the cuffs, welt side pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Viscose weave lining.
Top in soft, brushed jersey with a small stand-up collar, long, wide raglan sleeves and a straight hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a square neckline trimmed in broderie anglaise, lacing at the top and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a fine rib knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, long sleeves and skirt with a wrapover and slit at the front.
Short balloon-shaped skirt in a rustling weave with a drawstring at the waist and a rounded, elasticated hem. Jersey lining.
Poncho in a soft, fine knit with a rib-knit polo neck.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Boxy jumper knitted in soft cashmere with ribbed sections, a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. The cashmere content of the jumper is partly recycled.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.
Metal rings in various designs, one decorated with a plastic stone and one with a reconstituted stone.

Fully lined bikini top. Triangular cups with removable inserts and cut-out sections at the bottom, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways at the back. No fasteners.
Metal chain bracelet decorated with plastic beads and pendants in various designs. Adjustable length.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend. Ribbed shaft with an intarsia motif and elasticated tops.
Trainers in imitation suede and canvas with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Calf-length wrap dress in a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck with a concealed press-stud and short sleeves. Seam and a tie belt at the waist and a gently flared skirt with concealed buttons at the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Flared dress in glittery tulle with a round, satin-trimmed, gathered neckline. Opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounced sleeves. Underdress in a patterned weave.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Jersey vest top with a print motif.
Long-sleeved body in soft, patterned, ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and press-studs at the crotch.
Patterned fishnet tights with an elasticated waist and reinforcement at the top.
Straight-cut top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Imitation suede cap with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in lace with long sleeves and seams under the bust with hole-embroidered insets. Flared skirt and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and front pockets. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in imitation suede with a high, elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Decorative welt front pockets and slim legs with a slit at the hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit alpaca blend with a deep V-neck at the back with a twisted knot detail. Concealed silicone trim at the shoulders and long, straight sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.

Shorter-style blouse in woven fabric with a small, gathered stand-up collar, an opening at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam with wide, gathered ties at the hem that fasten at the back. Unlined.
Imitation leather sandals with a decorative appliqué at the front and a hook and loop tab. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Set with three ear cuffs and a pair of hoop earrings in metal. The earrings have star-shaped pendants and are decorated with glass rhinestones. Two of the ear cuffs are also decorated with glass rhinestones. The zinc and brass content is recycled.

Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric and a pair of trousers in cotton twill. Top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, buttons down the front and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist and zip fly and button.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket with corozo nut buttons and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
